articles.description: The song reigns in 59th week on the Hot 100, having conquered platforms from TikTok to radio.
articles.content:
A song released in 2020, and about late nights in the middle of June, reaches No. 1 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in March 2022.

articles.title: Supreme Court declines to revive Bill Cosby prosecution - CNN
